mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.CLASSES_CODE, A.MACHINING_CODE, A.BREED_CODE, A.FEATURE_CODE, A.WEIGHT_CODE, A.GRADE_CODE, A.LOGIAREA_CODE) FROM PD_LOGIAREA_ORDERLEVEL A
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.CLASSES_CODE, A.MACHINING_CODE, A.BREED_CODE, A.FEATURE_CODE, A.WEIGHT_CODE, A.GRADE_CODE, A.LOGIAREA_CODE) FROM PD_LOGIAREA_ORDERLEVEL A

SELECT DISTINCT A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode, A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode, A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode, A.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode, A.WEIGHT_CODE AS weightCode, A.GRADE_CODE AS gradeCode, A.LOGIAREA_CODE AS logiareaCode, CONCAT(A.CLASSES_CODE, A.MACHINING_CODE, A.BREED_CODE, A.FEATURE_CODE, A.WEIGHT_CODE, A.GRADE_CODE) AS productId FROM PD_LOGIAREA_ORDERLEVEL A ORDER BY A.CLASSES_CODE,A.MACHINING_CODE,A.BREED_CODE, A.FEATURE_CODE, A.WEIGHT_CODE, A.GRADE_CODE,A.LOGIAREA_CODE
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}
